metadata.Title: CVE-2023-50981 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: ModularSquareRoot in Crypto++ (aka cryptopp) through 8.9.0 allows attackersto cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via crafted DER public-keydata associated with squared odd numbers, such as the square of268995137513890432434389773128616504853.

criterions.comment: libcrypto++ package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
